2601.bart_summary: Sir Bradley Wiggins will bid to break cycling's hour record in June. The four-time Olympic champion will attempt to ride the furthest distance in 60 minutes at the Lee Valley VeloPark. The current Hour record is 52.491km, set by Australian Rohan Dennis in February. Tickets to watch Wiggins attempt to break the UCI Hour Record will go on sale to the general public on April 19.
